content: 1 c f b lassic rench eret a design from badknittyknits the yarn does all the work in this chic and quick to knit hat keep it simple with a luxe tonal hand painted fabric pair it with a trench coat and a bold scarf and when you go to paris you will be asked for directions… i was size fits an average woman s head 54 5 57 cm 211/ - 221/ 2 2 materials yarn 1 skein of handmaiden fine yarn cashmere 4 ply 169m/185yd 50 grams in a subtle series colourway needles 3mm/us2 5 40cm/16 and 3 25mm/us3 60cm/24 circulars and a set of 3 25/us3 dpns or size needed to get gauge other 6 stitch markers one in a different colour to mark beginning of round darning needle gauge on smaller needles 24 st and 32 row over 10cm/4 of stockinette stitch knit in the round this pattern has been published for your personal use please do not reproduce sell or sell items made from this pattern for more information contact badknitty at ravelry com ©badknittyknits 2012 2 directions using the larger needle and a long tail cast on co 104 st put work onto smaller needle and join in round pm to mark beginning of round knit in st st for 2 5cm/1 *k1 p1* for 2 row increase - *k1 k1f&b* - 156 st knit in st st for another 2 5cm/1 change to larger needles and st st until work measures 11 5cm/41/ from rolled 2 edge about 9cm/31/ from top of ribbed section place 5 more markers evenly 2 around knitting ie every 26 st start decreases - *k to 2 st before marker k2tog slm* 6 times repeat for every round until 6 st remain change to dpns when the work becomes too small for your circular needle *k1 k2tog* twice 4 st remain topper k a 4 st i cord for 5 or 6 row break yarn leaving a 10cm/4 tail thread the tail on to a needle and pull through the last 4 st and then down through the i cord into the hat finishing weave in loose ends dampen thoroughly and block on a 27cm/101/ dinner plate don t skip this step et voila 2 if you really need it to be larger co 108 st and make the brim 1 25cm/1/ 2 deeper before beginning the decreases just keep in mind the 20% rule measure your head knock off 20% and that s as big as it should be glossary of terms co cast on p p u r l k knit p m p l a c e m a r k e r kf&b knit through the front and back slm slip marker of the stitch st stitch k2tog knit 2 stitches together s t s t s t o c k i n e t t e s t it c h this pattern has been published for your personal use please do not
